episode_event_general_halloween_2021/670:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I’ve been looking all over for you.

I wanted to give you an invitation to the
Midnight Spookfest.

It’s a ghastly, ghoulish battle event that takes
place in a haunted mansion.

Lear had hoped to pass on the invitation personally
as the host of the event...

but apparently he’s a bit preoccupied with all of
the preparation right now, so the task has fallen
upon me.

Speaking of which, I should probably get going.
Lots of invitations to hand out...

Was that Caitlin just now? It’s odd to see her
without Darach at her side.

I’m guessing she gave you an invite to the
Spookfest as well?

I’m excited to see what all the hype is about.
Who knows what spine-chilling surprises Lear
has in store for us.
I figured I’d dress up for the occasion in any case.

It sounds like it’s going to be a night to
remember... *chuckle*
episode_event_general_halloween_2021/680:
This’ll be the perfect venue
for some special training!
A ghastly night full of frightful ghost Pokémon...

Sounds like an excellent opportunity for me and
my partner to train. I can’t wait.

Hmm... You’re always thinking about training,
aren’t you.

Though you seem like someone who battles with
strength and kindness in equal measure...
